page.title: 17MY WEEKLY POCKET MONEY
page.content:
Sunday 30p Sweets Monday 35p Crisps Tuesday Â£1.00 Savings (Barclays) Wednesday 30p Lolly & drink Thursday Â£1.00 Savings Friday 32p Ice Cream Saturday Â£2.40 Ice Cream & Cinema
My dad and mum give me this money every day to get me out of the house and to stop me from bothering them. So when I get this money I go round to my best friend's house and she gets money off her parents too. Then we go to the shops for sweets or go to the station for a "Saveway" so that we can go on a bus ride. The Saveway costs us 30 pence each and is a ticket which is valid for an adult or child on a train or bus for certain special hours. Annetta Harford aged 14.
